response.overview: Metin, who finds an old map while collecting the belongings of his deceased father, takes the map to a woman nicknamed Cinci Hodja. The woman says that the map was made 300 years ago and that a tomb where the treasure chest is buried is marked on the map. The excavation to find the treasure leads to the emergence of the demons that were imprisoned 300 years ago. Metin escaped from the village by taking his daughter Dilek with him by getting rid of the curse with the amulet given by the elf teacher. After 22 years, Metin gives the amulet to his daughter and commits suicide. Wishing to fulfill her father's will and end the curse, Dilek goes with her friends to Lübbey Village, where no one goes.
response.title: Lübbey’in Laneti
